snippet: A part-time student shot a longtime administrator at Stevens Institute of Business and Arts in the chest on Tuesday, before turning the gun on himself, the police said.
abstract: Part-time student at Stevens Institute of Business and Arts in St Louis shoots a longtime administrator there before turning gun on himself; condition of both men remains unclear.
lead_paragraph: A part-time student shot a longtime administrator at Stevens Institute of Business and Arts in the chest on Tuesday, before turning the gun on himself, the police said.

headline.main: Missouri: Administrator, Gunman Wounded at School
headline.print_headline: Missouri: Administrator, Gunman Wounded at School
